attributes.action: Follow the steps of the American's and give out economic stimulus cheques.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The American government sent 130 million homes cheque of between 800 and 1200 dollars to use to either reduce their personal credit card\bank debts or to purchase consumer goods, in order to warm up the US economy. We should be looking into this as a possible way to avoid the current, inevitable, economic problems of the future here in the UK.
